channel.title: Max Hits
channel.description:
I changed the spec accuracy and damage rate and now some weapons are fucked up :(
Can you please tell me your stats for:
Claws: Ags: Korasi: Dragon Dagger:
Mine are:
Claws: Accuracy: 9.0 Damage: 1.80
Ags: Accuracy: 5.50 Damage: 2.20
Korasi: Accuracy: 12.99 Damage: 2.40
Dragon Dagger: Accuracy: 2.50 Damage: 1.90
Is there any max hit calculator for this thing?
